name: Vortrus
description:
Defend Your Home Planet Through Any Means Necessary

Blast your way through hordes of unique foes in an attempt to save your home planet from impending doom. 

Eliminate Your Foes In a Variety of Stunning Interstellar Locales

Use a variety of unique ships to mercilessly kill off your oppressors, then take the war to them! 

Take Action in an Intergalactic Conflict

Your actions will influence the entire galaxy - are you ready to heed the call and be the defender of peace? Or will you take advantage of your influence and seek power for yourself?

Decide Your Destiny

The galaxy is in your hands. Do you have what it takes to do what you must to survive?
